title: Headhunter bundle.
body:
Is it just me or does the headhunter bundle NOT include headhunter akali?

Not in the picture, nor the description when you click unlock. What's up with that? Why make it a bundle if you aren't putting in the new headhunter skin with it, they came out at the same time even? Am I crazy or is akali just not in there?

And why, if so?

rito katey pls?

replies.body:
Hwy Jixx! 

You're correct, Headhunter Akali isn't in the bundle. 

If you check out [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E3O2AXzZ-i-wonder-how-many-people-will-buy-headhunter-bundle-and-will-be-like), one of our e-commerce bros provides a bit more context!
